note.p: Military officer, member of parliament, and landowner. Lieutenant, Royal Marines, 1780. Captain, independent company of foot, 1790. Major, Worcestershire volunteer cavalry, 1798; brevet lieutenant-colonel, 1803. Married Elizabeth Ann Pole in 1792. Inherited an estate at Abberley, Worcestershire, in 1803. MP for Worcester, 1806–7. Sheriff, Worcestershire, 1809–10.
